Project description

This project is aimed at getting user-centric article statistics for a specified date.

  • DNA contest page: http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/WP:DNA
  • General stats page: http://pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Dzie%C5%84_Nowego_Artyku%C5%82u/statystyki
